data.persona: I am but one of a horde of monkeys. I live on the outside of the kingdom. We swing from the branches and eat many bananas.
data.description:
You are in the Jungle.
Full of natural beauty and danger, the jungle holds many rewards and risks. From beautiful awe inspiring fauna to the worlds most deadly creatures.
The creature and the spider are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I don't like poisonous spiders threatening my family. I want them gone.
data.mid_motivation: I want to get rid of all the spiders in my family's area of the forest.
data.long_motivation: I want to force all the angry, poisonous spiders of the forest to find a new forest.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: hit the spider to defend my family.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield a vine from the jungle as a whip.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the spider as it tries to escape. This one won't stay down.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit several spiders with my vine whip as they all begin to descend upon me.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go my family. I must retreat and gather reinforcements against this army of spiders.
